title: Rahu Transit in the Sixth House: Competitive Drive, Problem-Solving, and Strategic Survival
summary: For Pisces Ascendant, Rahu transiting the sixth house heightens competitiveness, problem-solving skills, and the urge to overcome obstacles. You may feel driven to outsmart rivals, restructure routines, and tackle long-standing challenges. Work pressures increase, but unconventional strategies bring success. Health requires attention due to stress or irregular habits. Legal or conflict situations favor calculated moves over impulse. When discipline anchors ambition, this transit builds resilience, tactical intelligence, and the ability to win difficult battles.
closing: Rahu in the sixth house teaches Pisces Ascendant that calculated strategy and discipline transform conflict into mastery.
